thread.title: Henrikh Mkhitaryan comes first, second AND third in Manchester United's Goal of the Month competition
thread.title_full: Henrikh Mkhitaryan comes first, second AND third in Manchester United's Goal of the Month competition

author: Liam Corless
title: Henrikh Mkhitaryan comes first, second AND third in Manchester United's Goal of the Month competition
text:
Sport Henrikh Mkhitaryan comes first, second AND third in Manchester United's Goal of the Month competition The Armenian endured a difficult start to life in the Premier League but his United career burst into life in December Share Henrikh Mkhitaryan's scorpion kick effort against Sunderland netted him United's Goal of the Month award for December (Photo: AFP) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Henrikh Mkhitaryan barely got a kick in the first three months of the season but his Manchester United career exploded into life in December. 
It was unclear why Jose Mourinho used the talented Armenian so sparingly up until November, but his early season struggles now seem a distant memory as he has made United's right wing spot his own with a series of impressive displays. 
Mkhitaryan has scored three goals for United to date; all of them in December and all of them utterly magnificent. 
So good they were, that the 27-year-old placed first, second AND third in United's Goal of the Month competition. 
His first, a solo strike in the Europa League away to Zorya Luhansk, showcased his superb dribbling ability, while his second, an unerring finish against Tottenham in the Premier League, was a perfect demonstration of his ruthlessness in front of goal. Mkhitaryan's first goal for United came in the Europa League against Zorya Luhansk... (Photo: Pro Sports Images Ltd) ... and he followed that up just days later with his first Premier League strike against Spurs (Photo: Matthew Peters) 
Mkhitaryan's third effort of the month, his scorpion kick against Sunderland, unsurprisingly topped the fan vote, with 79 per cent of supporters deeming that to be United's best goal of the month. 
The individual effort against Zorya came second with nine per cent of the vote and Mkhitaryan's goal against Spurs garnered four per cent of the vote. 
Mkhitaryan also came second to Zlatan Ibrahimovic in United's Player of the Month competition for December. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
